[
  {
    "beat_id": "BEAT-SCN-ARC-003-003-001",
    "action": "The lighthouse beam flickers violently before dying completely, plunging the chamber into absolute darkness as something massive shifts in the depths below",
    "intention": "Establish the failure of Elias's protective barrier and the emergence of the entity",
    "pivot": false,
    "tension_delta": 1,
    "information_revealed": ["The lighthouse beam has completely failed", "The entity is rising from the depths"],
    "information_withheld": ["The true nature of the entity", "Whether Elias can survive without the light"]
  },
  {
    "beat_id": "BEAT-SCN-ARC-003-003-002",
    "action": "Elias feels the ancient stone beneath his feet crack and buckle as tentacles the size of ship masts emerge from the churning water, each one covered in eyes that burn with malevolent intelligence",
    "intention": "Reveal the physical manifestation of the cosmic horror",
    "pivot": false,
    "tension_delta": 1,
    "information_revealed": ["The entity has massive tentacles covered in eyes", "The lighthouse structure is being damaged"],
    "information_withheld": ["The entity's full form", "Elias's plan for survival"]
  },
  {
    "beat_id": "BEAT-SCN-ARC-003-003-003",
    "action": "The entity's voice resonates not through sound but directly into Elias's mind, speaking in languages that predate human civilization, promising him knowledge of the void between stars if he abandons his post",
    "intention": "Present the temptation that challenges Elias's duty",
    "pivot": false,
    "tension_delta": 0,
    "information_revealed": ["The entity can communicate telepathically", "It offers forbidden knowledge as temptation"],
    "information_withheld": ["Whether Elias will be tempted", "The true cost of accepting the entity's offer"]
  },
  {
    "beat_id": "BEAT-SCN-ARC-003-003-004",
    "action": "Elias grips the lighthouse's manual controls, his hands shaking as he realizes he must choose between his sanity and his duty, while the entity's presence fills his mind with visions of cosmic insignificance",
    "intention": "Force the central conflict between duty and self-preservation",
    "pivot": true,
    "tension_delta": 1,
    "information_revealed": ["Elias has manual controls available", "The entity is attacking his sanity directly"],
    "information_withheld": ["Whether the manual controls will work", "If Elias has the strength to resist"]
  },
  {
    "beat_id": "BEAT-SCN-ARC-003-003-005",
    "action": "With a cry that echoes his grandfather's final words, Elias ignites the emergency beacon, flooding the chamber with searing white light that causes the entity to recoil with a sound like reality tearing",
    "intention": "Show Elias choosing duty over safety, invoking family legacy",
    "pivot": false,
    "tension_delta": -1,
    "information_revealed": ["Elias chooses duty over temptation", "The emergency beacon can harm the entity", "His grandfather's sacrifice influences his decision"],
    "information_withheld": ["Whether this will be enough to defeat the entity", "The cost of using the emergency beacon"]
  },
  {
    "beat_id": "BEAT-SCN-ARC-003-003-006",
    "action": "The entity retreats into the depths, its parting psychic scream promising return, while Elias collapses against the controls, forever changed by what he has witnessed but having preserved the lighthouse's sacred duty",
    "intention": "Resolve the confrontation with victory at great personal cost",
    "pivot": false,
    "tension_delta": -1,
    "information_revealed": ["The entity is defeated but not destroyed", "Elias has been permanently changed by the encounter", "The lighthouse's duty is preserved"],
    "information_withheld": ["The full extent of Elias's psychological damage", "When the entity might return", "What other horrors might emerge"]
  }
]
